post.description: Create the Quote specified within the body of this request. The created Quote will be returned.

put.description: Moves an application to the opportunity specified by the context and opportunityId in the URL. If the specified opportunity already has an application of the same LOB, then it will be deleted and its quotes will be moved to the new application.

parameters.description: existingApplicationId

get.description: Search the Closed Opportunities specified by the pararms provided in the URL. A list of matched opportunities will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

parameters.name: isDescending
parameters.description: Whether to sort by ascending or descending

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Value to search

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: How to sort results. Must be one of the allowable values.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: How to filter the opportunities. Must be one of the allowable values

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: How to filter the opportunities on type

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Customer id to filter on

carrierForms.description: The map of carrier forms associated to the application. Map of carrier id to form instance ids.

carrierIds.description: List of carrier ids associated to the application

defaultFormInstanceId.description: The form ID of the form instance created using the form template version that is the default for the LOB

manualFormInstanceIds.description: List of form instance ids that are not the LOB default form

opportunityId.description: The id of the parent opportunity

updatedOn.description: When the application was last updated

ApplicationV1.description: This model describes a new or existing application.

carrierId.description: The ID of the carrier that the Carrier Submission was submitted to.

createdOn.description: When the Carrier Submission was created

entityId.description: The Tenant that the Carrier Submission belongs to.

status.description: The status of the Carrier Submission

submissionId.description: The Submission that the Carrier Submission belongs to.

tenantId.description: The Entity that the Carrier Submission belongs to.

updatedOn.description: When the Carrier Submission was updated

CarrierSubmissionV1.description: This model describes a new or existing Carrier Submission.

formTemplateVersionId.description: The id of the form template version.

productKey.description: The product key of the line of business that is associated to this form.

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

requestId.description: The unique ID of this request.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.

method.description: The method of paging that this pagingInfo contains

numberOfElements.description: The number of data elements in this response.

page.description: The page number of the response.

pageSize.description: The page size of this response.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages, based on the pageSize and totalElements

formTemplateVersionId.description: The id of the form template version.

name.description: The name of the form instance.

closedDate.description: The closed date of the opportunity

customerId.description: The customer id of which the opportunity is associated to

entityId.description: The entity id of the opportunity

expectedCloseDate.description: The expected close date of the opportunity

expectedPremium.description: The expected premium of the opportunity

mainProducerId.description: The id of the producer for this opportunity

productKeys.description: The product key of the products (LOBs) for this opportunity

signatureId.description: The signature id corresponding to a signature in document service. This signature will be used on all forms associated to the opportunity.

transferDate.description: The transfer date of the customer

updatedOn.description: When the opportunity was last updated

OpportunityV1.description: This model describes a new or existing Opportunity.

carrierMessage.description: A blob of text that may be included by the carrier during submission. Carrier Message.

entityId.description: The entity id of the quote, the customers id

note.description: A blob of text. Note for the quote.

paymentPlan.description: A blob of text that may be included by the carrier during submission. Payment Plan.

policyInformation.description: A blob of text that may be included by the carrier during submission. Policy Information.

policyNumber.description: Not a reference to a an actual Policy-Service policy, this field will likely be generated by a carrier during submission/entered by a user, it is free text entry and is not a foreign key.

proposalDocumentIds.description: The ids of the documents of this quote

submissionDate.description: The submission date of the quote

tenantId.description: The tenant id of the quote, the customers id

updatedOn.description: When the quote was last updated
